JavaScript

Responsive comes with a series of jQuery plugins and methods that provide common webpage components in a responsive format.

All plugins come with a markup API that allows running the plugin without writing a single line of JavaScript. This is Responsive's first class API and should be your first consideration when using a plugin.

Each plugin has also been built to be extensible, providing events that can be tapped into to allow you to further enhance your site.

Check out the details in each section.

﻿

Responsive is a responsive web development boilerplate built for your benefit by @james_m_south

Excerpts of this code are based on the incredibly hard work by the good people responsible for Normalize.css, HTML5 Boilerplate, Twitter Bootstrap, and Zurb Foundation.
